author: Special Correspondent
text:
: A flying squad in Manapparai assembly constituency seized cash amounting to Rs. 1.5 lakh that was carried without proper documents by a Kerala-based businessman at Ponnampalapatti toll plaza near Thuvarankurichi on Tuesday.

The team was carrying out checks to enforce the model code of conduct in the run up to the Assembly polls when it stopped a goods carrier at Ponnampalapatti toll plaza at around 7.30 a.m.

Official sources said the flying squad found Rs. 1.5 lakh cash in the possession of K. Harish of Malappuram in Kerala who was driving the vehicle. The vehicle was on its way to Karaikal.

The money, it is said, was being carried to buy fish from Karaikal. However, the team seized the amount as it was carried without any proper documents. The seized cash was later deposited in the Sub Treasury at Manapparai, the sources said.
title: Flying squad seizes cash from Keralite
